title.rendered: Mountainview Project Awarded to Alticor Inc

content.rendered: Alticor Inc has been awarded a construction contract by the U.S. Army Corps of Engineers, Baltimore District for the MOUNTAINVIEW Project located at Buckley Air Force Base, Aurora, Colorado, which will provide a new operations building and associated support facilities.  Alticor Inc is a leader in the delivery of sustainable construction projects for public and private clients, including administrative and mission critical facilities.  Alticor Inc was awarded the project based upon a best value decision and is committed to maximizing subcontracting opportunities on all projects.

excerpt.rendered: Alticor Inc has been awarded a construction contract by the U.S. Army Corps of Engineers, Baltimore District for the MOUNTAINVIEW Project located at Buckley Air Force Base, Aurora, Colorado, which will provide a new operations building and associated support facilities.
